description:
Inu no Ayakashi (or "Demon Dog") is the only friend http://anidb.net/ch138817 [Ise] ever had before meeting http://anidb.net/ch137033 [Aoi]. He was fascinated by human society and would often ask Ise to bring him along to the human world.
It sacrificed itself using all of its remaining power to bring Ise, who was then on the brink of death, to Aoi.
name: Inu no Ayakashi
